activity.title: openfoodfacts/smooth-app#6561
activity.text:
> Hi @AshutoshKhadse23! I cannot comment everything, but on your way to OOP you experienced some confusion (like casually returning empty `SizedBox()`) and "just-in-case"ism (like a `refresh` method that is NEVER used).

I am extremely embarrassed by it.

activity.title: openfoodfacts/smooth-app#6561
openfoodfacts/smooth-app#6576
activity.text: Glad it worked out! Thanks @monsieurtanuki for the review and merge. Will keep the final approach in mind for consistency in future components too.

activity.title: openfoodfacts/smooth-app#6576
activity.text:
> Hi @AshutoshKhadse23!
> 
> I didn't realize that there were _two_ impacted colors: for the `ShapeDecoration` and for the `Icon`. Could you please attach a screenshot?
> 
> Instead of repeating values I would have created two finals, but that's another story:
> 
> ```dart
> final Color background = lightTheme ? colors.primaryBlack : colors.primaryLight;
> final Color foreground = lightTheme ? Colors.white : colors.primaryDark;
> ```

But the color combination of each foreground and background is different somewhere, like:
```
backgroundColor:
             lightTheme ? colors.primaryBlack : colors.primaryLight,
foregroundColor:
             lightTheme ? Colors.white : colors.primaryDark,
```
AND
```
backgroundColor:
             lightTheme ? colors.primaryLight : colors.primaryDark,
foregroundColor:
             lightTheme ? colors.primaryDark : colors.primaryLight,
```
